title: What's with all the permissions?
comment: I went to install this via FDroid but the permissions weren't listed (yes I had the right settings on). Why does this app require so many invasive permissions? My phone number? The number I'm calling? My phone ID? WTF?

I do understand your frustration. However, all the permissions, and why they are needed, are explained on the projects github page ( https://github.com/bottiger/SoundWaves/ ). The project is also open source so anyone with coding experience can verify the app **never** shares any data without your permission.

Mail me if you have further questions

title: Nice app
comment: But UI is not clean and fast
That is my main focus at the moment. Please try it again in a month or two

title: Buggy
comment: I liked it but there is a lot of bugs whenever I play a song the little counter will continue going while it loads and it will mess up the song when it plays

I know it's buggy, but I'm working on it (almost) every single day. It will take some time before I get everything nailed down the way I like it, but I do take my users feedback very seriously. You are more than welcome to get in touch with me at soundwavesbugs@gmail.com, then I will make it my first priority to fix the issue you are talking about.
